column3: Sheesh; was that all this place had?
I figured the /speed:down/big; bad; /speed:init/Vampretti manor would be more exciting
Jax; what are you doing in here?

column1: -Jax turns to glance back at the scorpiee bodies and beams up at Zeffron.

column3: I snuck in because I was looking for the Book of Transference.
/select:1//move:-50/Look; I know what you’re gonna say. But I’m not stopping.
Easy; Jax. Take it easy./select:1//move:0/ I’m on your side.

column1: -Zeffron doesn’t move. He turns around forces the smile again.

column3: I think I understand why you left; and I just...
I dunno; I missed my brother./move:75/
/move:-25/Except; we're not brothers. Not really anyway./move:0/
Now come on./move:0/ We’ve got work to do.
It's called hiding in plain sight.
